H0.text: Which country is famous for its Blue Lagoon hot springs bathing lake. Iceland

H1.text: Which country is famous for its Blue Lagoon hot springs bathing lake. Japan

H2.text: Which country is famous for its Blue Lagoon hot springs bathing lake. New Zealand

H3.text: Which country is famous for its Blue Lagoon hot springs bathing lake. Hyui

A4.text: The Blue Lagoon (Icelandic: Bláa lónið [ˈplauːa ˈlouːnɪθ]) is a geothermal spa in southwestern Iceland.
